meanings.sent1: She is very antismoke and always reminds her friends about the dangers of smoking.
meanings.sent2: The antismoke campaign in the city has led to a decrease in the number of smokers.
meanings.sent3: The antismoke cat refused to go near anyone who smelled like smoke.
meanings.sent4: Her antismoke attitude was like a shield against the harmful effects of cigarettes.
meanings.sent5: The antismoke message was clear: smoking is harmful to your health.

meanings.definition: A person or organization that campaigns against smoking.
meanings.sent1: The antismoke at the event distributed flyers with information on the dangers of smoking.
meanings.sent2: She joined the antismoke group to help raise awareness about the risks of tobacco use.
meanings.sent3: The antismoke organization's mascot was a superhero fighting against cigarettes.
meanings.sent4: The antismoke activists were determined to make their community smoke-free.
meanings.sent5: Being an antismoke meant dedicating time to educate others about the harms of smoking.
